languages.text: {n}Услышав имя учителя, Паскаль издает хриплый статический вздох.{/n} "Они связаны. Моя гипотеза про связь Авеля и благословенного Амарната подтверждена".
{n}On hearing his mentor's name, Pasqal lets out a raspy, static-filled sigh.{/n} "They are connected. My hypothesis regarding Abel's connection to the blessed Amarnat has been confirmed."
languages.original_text: {n}Услышав имя учителя, Паскаль издает хриплый статический вздох.{/n} "Они связаны. Моя гипотеза про связь Авеля и благословенного Амарната подтверждена".

traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}彼の師の名前を耳にして、パスカルは耳障りな静電気を帯びたため息をついた。{/n}「彼らは繋がっているのです。アベルとアマルナトの絆に関する自分の仮説は確認されました」
languages.original_text: {n}On hearing his mentor's name, Pasqal lets out a raspy, static-filled sigh.{/n} "They are connected. My hypothesis regarding Abel's connection to the blessed Amarnat has been confirmed."

traits.locale_text: {n}彼の師の名前を耳にして、パスカルは耳障りな静電気を帯びたため息をついた。{/n}「彼らは繋がっているのです。アベルとアマルナトの絆に関する自分の仮説は確認されました」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}听到导师的名字时，帕斯卡发出了刺耳的叹息，声音里充满了静电声。{/n}“这一切都是相关的。我认为亚伯与蒙福者阿玛纳特之间有联系，这个假设此刻已经得到了证实。”
languages.original_text: {n}On hearing his mentor's name, Pasqal lets out a raspy, static-filled sigh.{/n} "They are connected. My hypothesis regarding Abel's connection to the blessed Amarnat has been confirmed."

traits.locale_text: {n}听到导师的名字时，帕斯卡发出了刺耳的叹息，声音里充满了静电声。{/n}“这一切都是相关的。我认为亚伯与蒙福者阿玛纳特之间有联系，这个假设此刻已经得到了证实。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Als er den Namen seines Mentors hört, seufzt Pasqal knisternd und voller Rauschen.{/n} "Sie sind verbunden. Meine Hypothese einer Verbindung zwischen Abel und dem gesegneten Amarnat hat sich bestätigt."
languages.original_text: {n}On hearing his mentor's name, Pasqal lets out a raspy, static-filled sigh.{/n} "They are connected. My hypothesis regarding Abel's connection to the blessed Amarnat has been confirmed."

traits.locale_text: {n}Als er den Namen seines Mentors hört, seufzt Pasqal knisternd und voller Rauschen.{/n} "Sie sind verbunden. Meine Hypothese einer Verbindung zwischen Abel und dem gesegneten Amarnat hat sich bestätigt."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}À l'évocation du nom de son mentor, Pasqal laisse échapper un soupir rauque entrecoupé de parasites.{/n} « Ils sont liés. Mon hypothèse relative au lien d'Abel avec l'auguste Amarnat se confirme. »
languages.original_text: {n}On hearing his mentor's name, Pasqal lets out a raspy, static-filled sigh.{/n} "They are connected. My hypothesis regarding Abel's connection to the blessed Amarnat has been confirmed."

traits.locale_text: {n}À l'évocation du nom de son mentor, Pasqal laisse échapper un soupir rauque entrecoupé de parasites.{/n} « Ils sont liés. Mon hypothèse relative au lien d'Abel avec l'auguste Amarnat se confirme. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Al oír el nombre de su mentor, Pasqal deja escapar un suspiro ronco y distorsionado por la estática.{/n} «Están relacionados. Mi hipótesis acerca de la relación entre Abel y el bendito Amarnat se ha confirmado».
languages.original_text: {n}On hearing his mentor's name, Pasqal lets out a raspy, static-filled sigh.{/n} "They are connected. My hypothesis regarding Abel's connection to the blessed Amarnat has been confirmed."

traits.locale_text: {n}Al oír el nombre de su mentor, Pasqal deja escapar un suspiro ronco y distorsionado por la estática.{/n} «Están relacionados. Mi hipótesis acerca de la relación entre Abel y el bendito Amarnat se ha confirmado».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yönderinin ismini duyan Pasqal; bol parazitli, kulak tırmalayıcı bir şekilde iç çekiyor.{/n} "Birbirleriyle bağlantılılar. Abel'in kutsanmış Amarnat'la olan bağlantısına dair hipotezim onaylanmış durumda."
languages.original_text: {n}On hearing his mentor's name, Pasqal lets out a raspy, static-filled sigh.{/n} "They are connected. My hypothesis regarding Abel's connection to the blessed Amarnat has been confirmed."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yönderinin ismini duyan Pasqal, parazit sesiyle dolu, kulak tırmalayan bir şekilde iç çekiyor.{/n} "Birbirleriyle bağlantılılar. Abel'in, kutsanmış Amarnat'la olan bağlantısına dair hipotezim onaylanmış durumda."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
